about_the_game:
“Flesh is a dark fantasy game where you play as a mage who begins on a path to learn the secrets of necromancy. Journey through the broken world of Alma as you search for the powers locked within the human body.

What sort of mysteries will you uncover?”

Kleinman XOXO/Internet Personality

Reveal the Secrets of Alma

Embark on a journey through Alma's blasted lands and darkest dungeons, where every corner holds a new discovery. As you delve deeper, you will unravel the secrets that lie buried in this world, confront powerful foes, and make choices that shape your destiny.

Master Necromancy

Harness the power of necromancy to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Use the remains of defeated monsters to summon their undead counterparts and command them in strategic, turn-based combat. As you progress, discover new spells and hidden power-ups that enhance your abilities and add depth to your magical arsenal.

Features:

  • Originally released as part of the "A Game by Its Cover" 2018's game jam, this semi-open world adventure lets you tackle objectives in various orders, giving you the freedom to explore and conquer at your own pace.

  • Explore a Dark Fantasy World: Journey through a ruined land filled with monsters, hidden secrets, and ancient magic.

  • Engage in Tactical Combat: Use strategy and necromantic spells to defeat enemies and summon their undead forms to fight by your side.

  • Discover Powerful Spells and Items: Enhance Neux’s abilities with hidden power-ups and unlock the potential of necromancy.

Get ready to explore a world of dark secrets and test your skills against powerful foes. Face the demon lord Valak in a final showdown that awaits those who dare to discover the enigmas of Alma.

Download Flesh for free on Steam and uncover the power within!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work, including Cartoon-like Violence and Gore, Partial Nudity and General Mature Content.
